“This is a FANTASTIC tool, I think a lot of people will appreciate the fact that it is building the model code, building the price giving you 3d or 2D drawings that can be done within a few minutes, I think it is a great tool, we all know that a response time to a customer is key today, trying to reach everyone on the phone and by email is a pain, and being able to do it our self, will greatly help the sales team and engineering of course.”

-Pierre Martel
Directeur du Développement des relations fournisseurs | Director, Vendor Development

Learn how to use CPQ

CPQ – Frequently asked questions

How do I contact support?

If you are not a Registered User, click on the “Contact Sales” button, report the issue and submit. If you are a Registered User, click the “Contact Support” button, report the issue and submit.

How do I remove myself from your mailing list?

If you would like to remove yourself from the TWG mailing list please visit the TWG Preference Center

How do I contact the sales team?

You can contact the sales team by clicking here.

What if the product or option I am looking for is not in CPQ?

If the product or option that you are looking for is not in CPQ, please click here to contact the sales team about a custom quote.

How can I request for a product to be added to CPQ?

If you would like to request that a product be added to the TWG CPQ, please click here to contact the sales team.

What is the difference between a winch and a hoist?

This is somewhat controversial, and the answer may differ between experts. TWG’s definition is that a winch includes a drum that rope can wrap around, and it is designed pull a load horizontally along the ground. A hoist is like a winch except that it is designed to lift and suspend a load in the air, which has different industry regulatory requirements than a winch.

What are the calculators and how do I find them?

There are 5 calculators in CPQ to aid in selecting the best product for your application.

  • Drum capacity: calculate rope capacity on a winch and hoist
  • Winch and hoist performance: calculate the line pull and speed on any layer
  • Hydraulic pump drive: calculate required torque from your hydraulic pump pressures and flows
  • Fluid power: calculate hydraulic motor torque, power and speed
  • Drive: calculate required input torque in a gear set

How do I report a system problem?

If you are not a Registered User, click on the “Contact Sales” button, report the issue and submit. If you are a Registered User, click the “Contact Support” button, report the issue and submit.

If I submit a question or report a problem, how soon will I be contacted?

Within 1 business day for most requests

How long are my previous quotes visible?

6 months for an existing customer.

Do you offer e-commerce where I can purchase your products online?

No, not currently.

What models are in CPQ?

Readily available commercial product offerings in 5 categories:

  • Winches
  • Hoists
  • Gear drives/capstans
  • Slewing ring bearings
  • Hydraulic pump drives

What models are not in CPQ?

  • OEM proprietary products
  • Custom designs (our specialty)
  • Military products
  • Greer Company electronic products

How do I become a TWG customer or distributor to generate quotes and 3D CAD models?

Click “Request Access”, provide the requested information and submit. We should contact you within 10 business days.

Learn how to use CPQ
